title: Cases not provided for in chapter
context: ยง556-10 Cases not provided for in chapter. In any case not provided for in this chapter the rules of law and equity, including the law merchant and those rules of law and equity relating to trusts, agency, negotiable instruments, and banking, shall continue to apply. [L 1945, c 197, ยง12; RL 1955, ยง189-11; HRS ยง556-10]
